docs.snippet: Few Manchester United fans will ever forgive Malcolm Glazer for his acrimonious buyout of the club that left the 20-time English champions with millions of dollars of debt....

docs.snippet: Malcolm Glazer, the self-made American billionaire who died aged 85 on Wednesday, enjoyed sporting success as an owner on both sides of the Atlantic but will be remembered very differently in Tampa Bay and Manchester....

docs.snippet: Saying he wants kids to play sports but play safely, President Barack Obama called Thursday for more and better research into the effects and treatment of concussions in youth athletes. The issue is one of growing concern for parents who spend wee...
docs.lead_paragraph: Saying he wants kids to play sports but play safely, President Barack Obama called Thursday for more and better research into the effects and treatment of concussions in youth athletes. The issue is one of growing concern for parents who spend weekends driving their kids from one game to another.

headline.main: Obama Says Sports Concussions Need More Attention
headline.print_headline: Obama Says Sports Concussions Need More Attention
